name: tinily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that involves extremely small sizes or movements, or to a very small degree: The surface of the dish was tinily scratched. I filled the tortilla with rice, black beans, and some tinily chopped peppers.
More examplesFewer examplesThe waitress's name was stitched tinily onto her apron.A newborn chick was prancing around tinily in the middle of the coop.The bibliography at the back of the book spans thirty-six tinily printed pages.After a minute she opened her eyes and smiled tinily at me.
